channel.title: Downloads on Jare's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Downloads on Jare's Blog

item.title: Downloads
item.description:
• Articles and lecture slides
    • Slides from my talks at Mundos Digitales and GameLab, July 2006 (in Spanish).
    • Slides from my talk at the Universidad Politecnica de Catalunya, March 2006 (in Spanish).
    • Slides from my talk at the Universidad Complutense de Madrid, April 2005 (in Spanish).
    • Slides from my talk at the University of Seville in March 2003 (in Spanish).
  • Source Code
    • RectLayout, a class to aid in resolution-independent 2D layout of rectangles.
    • FontCreator 1.0, a tool to generate bitmap fonts from TrueTypes.
    • SpacePaint, a minigame.
    • SciteStart program to open files in existing SciTE window.
    • DXCSharp 0.2 minigame using C# and the DirectX Managed Extensions.
    • Durantro Source Code.
    • Despair Demo Source Code. Note: this will not compile as-is
    • Speed Haste Game Source Code. Note: this will not compile as-is
    • Minimal ZIP file loader. Note: requires the zlib library
    • Windows DLL Interfacing sample C++ project.
  • Demos and games
    • SpacePaint, a minigame.
    • DXCSharp 0.2 minigame using C# and the DirectX Managed Extensions.
    • Durantro 2 (Durango Love Tour Slideshow) joke production for the Durango Party ‘03.
    • Durantro 20Kb Intro for the Durango Party.
    • 1996’s Despair Demo
    • HeadHunter Technology Demo
  • Links to related external sites and applications
    • SciTE, an open source text editor.
    • Microsoft Powerpoint viewer to read ppt files.
